properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus immutably the same Thou true and living vine Around Thy all supporting stem My feeble arms I twine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Quickened by Thee and kept alive I flourish and bear fruit My life I fromThy sap derive My vigor from Thy root{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Grafted in Thee by grace alone In growth I daily rise And raised on this foundation-stone My top shall reach the skies{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I can do nothing without thee My strength is wholly Thine Withered and barren should I be If severed from the vine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Upon my leaf when parched with heat Refreshing dew shall drop The plant which Thy right hand hath set Shall ne'er be rooted up{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Till Thou hast led me to the place Of pure immortal joy The riches of Thy glorious grace Shall all my need supply{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Who from eternity decreed To glorify His own Will not forske the holy seed Nor take away their crown{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The righteous shall hold on their way Nor miss the promised land Jesus shall guard them night and day And hide them in His hand{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Each moment watered by Thy care And fenced with power divine Fruit to eternal life shall bear The feeblest branch of Thine{/lang-eng}
